title: Needing help with identification of button font
content:
Hello everyone,

New to the site, found you guys through searching for “font identification”. I tried many of the online identification systems but to no avail.

We are looking to add more buttons to our site but can’t find this font to match. The guy who developed the buttons for us is long gone, can’t contact him.

Any help would be much appreciated! I will post a variety of the buttons so you can see as many characters as possible.

Thanks again for any help you might have.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [modify.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615062016/http:/typophile.com/files/modify.gif) | 1.89 KB |
| [enter.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615062016/http:/typophile.com/files/enter.gif) | 2.49 KB |
author: foggydd

comments.content:
Often buttons are made with bitmap fonts, but I didn’t find these at Dafont among their nearly 500 bitmap fonts. If it’s not a bitmap font, it’s so small it’s hard to get a good idea what to look for.

- Mike Yanega
